### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Iron Plate Factory at position (52, -80)
Consists of following entities:
- Furnace (position (52.0, -80.0)) 
- Burner Inserter (position (53.5, -78.5)) 
- BeltGroup (position (51.5, -84.5) -> (53.5, -78.5)) 
- Transport Belt (position (53.5, -79.5))

### Iron Plate Factory at position (62, -54)
Consists of following entities:
- Furnace (position (62.0, -54.0))

### Storage at position (52.5, -82.5)
Consists of following entities:
- Wooden Chest (position (52.5, -82.5))

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner inserter
- Ensure the burner inserter has a valid fuel source before attempting to use it.
- Ensure the burner inserter has a valid pickup and drop position before attempting to use it.

### Errors when using furnace
- Ensure the furnace has a valid fuel source before attempting to use it.
- Ensure the furnace result inventory is not full before attempting to use it.

### NAMESPACE
- No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
- No important variables have been assigned.
